name: Shot! v1
description:
its a 2d shooter with a stupid ai. hope u like it. kinda looks like old flash inbuilt windows game.

experiment edition- includes custom cursor + skins but may have a few bugs and laggy.

cool edition  AKA shot! - not include skin or custom cursor but bugs are far fewer and not much laggy. 

mac edition- SAME AS COOL EDITION but for macs.

mobile edition- can be used on mobile (using cool edition)+ plain html.  have to say-- its crappy as hell. but worth it!

i wanna eat mac and cheese

for updates and development --https://discord.gg/jbAmVdvsVZ
